title: Three burn alive in collision in Kech - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
GWADAR: Three people were burnt alive when two vehicles collided in the Tump area of Kech district on Wednesday night.

According to the Tump assistant commissioner, the accident occurred late at night when two Land Cruisers crashed into each other. One of the vehicles was carrying petrol, which ignited on impact, causing a massive fire.

The victims have been identified as Abdul Waheed from Khuzdar, and Hasil and Abdullah, both residents of Balicha, Tump.

Published in Dawn, March 6th, 2025
